Comments_List: This course taught valuable information on the modern historical and political thought authors from Hobbes to Arendt. I also gained valuable writing skills.
I learned an incredible amount from this course. I gained valuable insights about each book and felt I had a good grip on understanding each of them.
This course is strong in its authors and reading list, but the reading are almost excessively long, especially as professors send out extra pages to read before class.
This course is very strong. I have no suggestions on how it could be improved, because I thoroughly enjoyed and learned a lot from each class.
We should actually read Perpetual Peace by Kant
I would recommend this course to another student because of how key some of the ideas in the course are to today's political environment.
Yes! I loved this class because Professor Semmel traced the development of political and historical thought in the western tradition in an engaging and enjoyable manner.
I would definitely recommend this course to another student. This course is very engaging, and I learned so much, and also had a lot of fun!
I would recommend this class to any student taking Directed Studies
